Uses of Package
net.xeoh.plugins.base

  • Packages that use net.xeoh.plugins.base 
    Package Description
    net.xeoh.plugins.base
    Contains the core plugin manager classes.
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl
    The PluginManagerFactory is the framework's entry point and the only class of relevance within this package, start exploring here.
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.options
    Top level package for core options.
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.addpluginsfrom
    Options to addPluginsFrom().
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin
    Options to getPlugin().
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.util
    Some utilities and wrappers for other objects / interfaces.
    net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.uri
    Utilities for URIs.
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker
    Top level package for the information broker.
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options
    Top level package for information broker options.
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish
    Options to publish().
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.subscribe
    Options to subscribe().
    net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.util
    Utils for various InformationBroker classes and objects.
  • Classes in net.xeoh.plugins.base used by net.xeoh.plugins.base 
    Class and Description
    Plugin
    The base class of all plugins.
    PluginInformation.Information
    The set of information item that can be requested.
    PluginManager
    This is your entry point to and the heart of JSPF.
  • Classes in net.xeoh.plugins.base used by net.xeoh.plugins.base.impl 
    Class and Description
    Plugin
    The base class of all plugins.
    PluginConfiguration
    Gives you access to configuration items of plugins.
    PluginInformation
    Returns various information about plugins, static as well as dynamic.

    This is your entry point to and the heart of JSPF.
